summary: Layout.tsx was updated to introduce dropdown-based header navigation using TanStack Router navigation, with a visible start of a “Customer” dropdown and supporting mobile menu state. However, due to truncation, the diff summary does not provide definitive evidence that all required links (for both Customer and Sellers & Businesses) and the required site-wide Privacy Policy dropdown item are fully implemented and present on both desktop and mobile, nor that the footer Privacy Policy link remains unchanged.

missing_requirements.reason: Although Sheet components and mobile menu state are present, the truncated diff does not show the actual mobile menu content/links to confirm parity with desktop dropdowns.
